name: firefox-tab-organizer
description: AI-powered Firefox Tab Groups organizer using TypeScript and Vercel AI SDK

scripts.start: bun run build && web-ext run -s dist/ --browser-console
scripts.package: bun run build && cd dist && zip -r firefox-tab-organizer.xpi .
scripts.sign:1p: bash -c 'export WEB_EXT_API_KEY=$(op item get "Mozilla Extension Sign" --field "JWT issuer" --reveal) && export WEB_EXT_API_SECRET=$(op item get "Mozilla Extension Sign" --field "JWT secret" --reveal) && bun run sign'

author: bhanutejags
